name: adrenal carcinoma
definition: An adrenal cancer that is located_in the cortex (steroid hormone-producing tissue) of the adrenal gland and that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrenocortical_carcinoma]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase I trial, Balversa (erdafitinib) treatment resulted tumor shrinkage and no disease progression for 10 months in an adrenal carcinoma patient harboring FGFR3-TACC3 and FGFR2-CCDC6 fusions (PMID: 26324363; NCT01703481).

references.title: Phase I Dose-Escalation Study of JNJ-42756493, an Oral Pan-Fibroblast Growth Factor Receptor Inhibitor, in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors.

clinicalTrials.title: Veliparib, Capecitabine, and Temozolomide in Patients With Advanced, Metastatic, and Recurrent Neuroendocrine Tumor
